title: Positive Energy Soundtrack
description: Bright, positive, and happy music for your game. This is an extensive pack, containing 24 tracks full of good and sunny energy totalling nearly an hour of original music.
longDescription:
Bright, positive, and happy music for your game. This is an extensive pack, containing 24 tracks full of good and sunny energy totalling nearly an hour of original music.


Preview Here


Twenty-four tracks:

1. Advertising Background (1:16)

2. Background Positive Mood (1:26)

3. Beautiful Calm Inspiration (2:23)

4. Bright Inspiration (1:42)

5. Electro Celebration (2:10)

6. Euphoria and Inspiration (2:34)

7. Fun Orchestra (2:29)

8. Good Energy (2:28)

9. Good Feeling (2:28)

10. Inspirational Feeling (2:18)

11. Inspire Them All (2:24)

12. Inspire With Beauty (2:12)

13. Inspiring Upbeat Ambient (2:11)

14. Not a Care (2:16)

15. Positive and Direct (2:18)

16. Positive Background (2:13)

17. Positivity (2:16)

18. Progress and Imagination (2:14)

19. Proud Successful Moment (2:08)

20. Relaxing Groove (2:09)

21. Sunny Inspiration Groove (0:52)

22. Sunny SUmmer Ukulele (1:28)

23. Upbeat Ukulele and Bells (1:17)

24. Warm Background Harmonics (2:44)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Twenty-Four Complete and Versatile Musical Cues
  • Brings a happy and positive character
  • Wide range of styles

Number of Audio Wavs: 24

Number of Audio Cues: 24

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes, non seamless

Minutes of audio provided: 50

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: Mobile (any)

Sampler: https://soundcloud.com/sound-phenomenon/positive-energy-soundtrack-sampler
